For over 60 years we have been successfully developing daily skincare products, for babies as well as parents and older children.

Meril Baby Powder is a high-quality baby powder designed to provide gentle care and protection to your little one's delicate skin. It comes in a convenient 100 gm pack and is made by the well-known brand Meril, which is known for producing a wide range of baby care products.As a baby powder, Meril Baby Powder is specially formulated to help keep your baby's skin dry, soft, and smooth. It is made with carefully selected ingredients that are gentle and non-irritating to your baby's delicate skin, making it a great choice for parents who are concerned about using safe and effective products on their babies.What's more, Meril Baby Powder is very easy to use. Simply smooth it all over your baby's body, paying extra attention to sensitive areas, and apply it at nappy change or whenever your baby feels damp. This will help keep your baby feeling fresh and comfortable throughout the day.Overall, if you're looking for a high-quality baby powder that is gentle, effective, and easy to use, the Meril Baby Powder is definitely worth considering. Its carefully selected ingredients and gentle formula make it a great choice for parents who want to ensure their baby's delicate skin is well taken care of.

product_name: Kodomo Baby Powder Extra Mild 100 gm
product_details: Kodomo Baby Powder Extra Mild specially formulated for your baby's delicate skin. This talcum-free powder provides a soft and comforting touch, helping to keep your baby dry, fresh, and comfortable throughout the day. The extra mild formula of the baby powder is designed to minimize the risk of skin irritation, making it suitable for daily use. It absorbs excess moisture, helping to prevent diaper rash and skin chafing, while also providing a gentle and refreshing fragrance.With its fine texture, the Kodomo Baby Powder Extra Mild is easy to apply and provides a smooth and silky feel on your baby's skin. It helps to keep your baby's skin dry and cool, maintaining a comfortable and healthy environment. Simply apply a small amount of the powder onto your baby's skin, focusing on areas prone to moisture, and gently pat it in for a fresh and dry feeling. Kodomo is a trusted brand known for its dedication to providing safe and gentle products for babies.With its commitment to quality and care, you can trust Kodomo Baby Powder Extra Mild to keep your baby's skin happy, protected, and comfortable. Choose Kodomo Baby Powder Extra Mild for a gentle and soothing experience for your baby's delicate skin. Enjoy the softness and freshness that this powder provides, and keep your baby dry and comfortable throughout the day.
